extracted_information: Complete pricing information for DeepSeek API models (deepseek-chat and deepseek-reasoner), including input and output token costs, standard and discounted rates, context lengths, and maximum output tokens. All prices are per 1M tokens.

models.name: deepseek-reasoner
models.notes: Maximum input length is 64K, output length not counted toward context limit. max_tokens parameter limits max output tokens including COT part. Output token count includes all tokens from CoT and final answer, priced equally.

pricing.billing_method: Based on total number of input and output tokens
pricing.deduction_rules: Expense = number of tokens Ã— price. Fees deducted from topped-up balance or granted balance (granted preferred).
pricing.disclaimer: Product prices may vary, DeepSeek reserves right to adjust them.
